company.name: EV Solar
company.description:
EV Solar performs full EPC services, undertaking PV projects with its skilled and dedicated teams. The knowledge acquired by its managers in EPC services and solutions during 30+ years of aggregate experience guarantees high quality and cost-effective services to achieve customer needs.

EV Solar is also expert in Operations & Maintenance, providing its customers thorough professional services that meet the needs of their solar power plant.

Our engineers have provided consulting and engineering services for 200+ large solar projects, totaling a combined capacity of 500+ MWs throughout Europe, Caribbean, United States and its territories.


MISSION 

"Our mission is to create value for our stakeholders (employees, customers, suppliers, partners and society), through the development of our sustainable EPC activity, thus achieving the highest quality standards implementing environmentally sound solar energy resources.

We consider our employees as one of our greatest strategic assets, promoting their training, development and equal opportunity. We are committed to improve society contributing to create high skilled employment opportunities, enrich local communities and protect the environment".


VISION 

“Our vision focuses in becoming a reference for our customers in designing and executing photovoltaic solar projects, with high standards in technics, safety, transparency and ethical business manners. We believe in vertical integration to achieve success in customer satisfaction as a pivotal element of our business strategy”.
